content.raw:
I think this is good. I have no preference on what to do with the existing demo systems, I'll leave that up to you.

Just for future reference, this is how to run the example now:

`GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH=examples/dummy_demo/systems/ ./examples/dummy_demo/dummy_demo`
